Content.Text:
<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hi, <MYNAME>! Agate was just looking for
you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heh. She said she was going to ask you on a
date. Aren't you two the lovey-dovey couple!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! <MYNAME>...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm? How strange... All of a sudden I have this
strange, fluttery, burny feeling in my chest.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I should get going. See you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>! Hello. Um...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I don't understand what's happening to me.
<PAGE>
When I saw you talking with Lillie, I suddenly
got this fluttery, burny feeling in my chest, and I
don't know what it could be...
Heartburn?
Jealousy?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that could be it.
<PAGE>
I wanted to ask you on a date, but if I have
heartburn, I should probably go home and rest
until it goes away.
<PAGE>
See you later, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Jealousy? Hmmm... You might be right...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I remember observing a monkey couple once.
One day, Mr. Monkey was having fun playing
with another girl monkey.
<PAGE>
And Mrs. Monkey sat slumped on a branch,
looking at them really sadly the whole time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I feel like I could sit on a branch feeling sad right
now, too. So I guess it is jealousy. I've never felt
this way before...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I feel like I've learned
something really super important today!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
But... It isn't good to be jealous, is it?
<PAGE>
It doesn't feel good, and it doesn't make
anything better. That fluttery, burny feeling is
really unpleasant.
<PAGE>
Plus, even though I don't mean it that way,
being jealous is almost like I'm saying I don't
trust you and Lillie!
<PAGE>
Now I feel terrible...like I've been a bad person...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You're...happy?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well...I guess everyone feels jealous every now
and again. So...you think me being jealous is a
sign of how much I care for you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If that's the case, then, um...have you ever been
jealous over me?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>R-really...? Then I guess that means you care for
me a whole lot, too!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm starting to see how being jealous could make
someone feel just the teeniest bit happy...
<PAGE>
And the fluttery-burny feeling has gone away
now, too.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART1_L>Heh! It's like your words had some kind of magic
medicine in them, and made me feel all better.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>But...someday I might feel all jealous again, just
like I did today.
<PAGE>
That doesn't mean I don't trust you anymore, or
that I'm being mean...
<PAGE>
It'll be just like you said. Proof that I love you a
whole lot.
<PAGE>
So I really hope you won't hate me because of
my jealousy!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_L>Heh! Thanks. I think I've fallen in love with you
all over again today!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Every time I think I've got you figured out, you
always surprise me -- in the best ways!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm so lucky that you let me be your girlfriend!
<PAGE>
I hope we can be a lovey-dovey super-happy
couple for a long, long time, <MYNAME>! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's right! The whole reason I was looking
for you was because I wanted to ask you on a
date.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, do you have some free time right
now? Let's go out together!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Sounds good? Yay! ♪ I'm on top of the
world. Come on, let's go!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
What in the world could this weird fluttery,
burny feeling be...?
